project.strategy

Interface Strategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Basic, BasicStrategy, Greed, GreedyStrategy, Human, HumanStrategy, Random, RandomStrategy, Unfriendliness, UnfriendlyStrategy

    public interface Strategy
extends java.io.Serializable
    According to strategy pattern, base details are encapsulated in the interface,
    and implementation details are buried in the different player strategy classes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Strategy.Name
      Name enumeration represents different menu choices.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int inputOption(int number_options, Strategy.Name status, Game game)
      This method determine the strategy of the player in a game and what option they have selected.

    • Method Detail

      • inputOption

        int inputOption(int number_options,
                Strategy.Name status,
                Game game)
        This method determine the strategy of the player in a game and what option they have selected.
        Parameters:
        number_options - option selected by player
        status - what strategy is currently being used by player
        game - The current game played
        Returns:
        The option selected by player
